title: Interior Plans November Auction for Offshore New Jersey Wind Energy Rights
text:
28 Interior Plans November Auction for Offshore New Jersey Wind Energy Rights 
Renewable Energy World: U.S. Secretary of the Interior Sally Jewell and Bureau of Ocean Energy Management (BOEM) Director Abigail Ross Hopper announced Sept. 23 that 343,833 acres offshore New Jersey will be offered for commercial wind energy development in a competitive lease sale on Nov. 9, 2015.
